TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but you have to make a new thread for that or break the OP.

I wish I had a piece of dirt.

Granted. It is inside your lungs and kills you.

I wish for epicality.

Granted, epic-ness is all around you.

I wish Radion would post a giant trollface instead of the RP forum.

Granted. It replaces your face.

I wish that Radion didn\'t make \'The Test\' so long...

Granted, but now the test is to never go on the Internet again.

I wish that Charzy had a tomato on their face.

Granted, but he bans you from the RP board for throwing it at him T_T

I wish for Imandreas to have a tomato on his face.

Granted, but my face is already red from getting hit from a banhammer, so nobody notices it.

I wish my nation got approved.

Granted, but my face is already red from getting hit from a banhammer, so nobody notices it.

I wish my nation got approved.

granted but its tiny

i wish to pass the test with 75%

Granted, but nobody takes you serious.

I wish the air on earth contained 2% THC.

Granted, but the meaning of THC is changed to \'The Hydrogen Clock\'.

I wish for no-one to question \'The Hydrogen Clock\'.

Granted, but the meaning of THC is changed to \'The Hydrogen Clock\'.

I wish for no-one to question \'The Hydrogen Clock\'.

Granted, but questions with less than four words will be allowed.

I wish for space.

Granted; It\'s in your house, rummaging through your underwear.

I wish for infinite Pepsi.

granted but you rott you teath to hothing

i wish for a mac instead of a pc

Granted, but it\'s obsolete within 10 seconds.

I wish for Apple to be innovative.

Granted, but the price will go up exponentially each day.

I wish for world pizza (not peace, pizza!).

Granted, but the NATO becomes paranoid and forms an anti-pizza tasc force, leading into pizzanuclear world war.

I wish for stable WLAN on camping 5tars la yole (or having them loose a star)

Granted , but the Stable WLAN is used by Area 51.

I wish to send the Mun on an escape trajectory....

Whoops. Bumped up a dead thread. *edited.

Granted, but the mun begins orbiting around Kerbol instead, and crash-lands on kerbin, destroying everything in its path.

I wish I could talk to trees

Granted, but they take offense and pummel the horse defecation out of you.

I wish I had more wishes.

Granted, but the extra wish that you wished for is the wish you just used to wish for more wishes...

I wish I had talking animals that could play the piano

Granted, but they tire of you. One happens to be a Bengal tiger.

I wish I had a pet tiger.

granted, but it kills you and eats your body.

I wish for KSP 1.0 to be realeased.....

Granted, but the beta version already came out and you can't afford the full version as you have no money.

I wish I was an bird

Granted, but you are a dodo so you are extinct.

I wish to go to the moon.

Granted, but without a spacesuit your bodily fluids boil off and you bloat like a blowfish.

I wish to be the dictator of a country.

Granted, but you're Adolf Hitler, so you died and went to hell (if your a religious guy, if not then you died and most of the world hates your guts).

I wish to eat fire and live!

Edited September 16, 2012 by Whptheenah
That last one I did was hard
